document_data.name: Hesione
document_data.mainbody: '''Hesione''' was a popular tailor who lived in [[Sambral]], one of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|7}}
document_data.Description: Hesione was a lovely [[human]] female. When she converted to the worship of [[Sune]], she dyed her hair red to honor the [[god]]dess.
document_data.History: At some point before 1479 DR, Hesione converted to the worship of Sune.
